author: gozer
msg: fix the tag target for SVN

author: radup
msg: Fix for a bug such that if the internal state of the circular buffer utilized in Saver.entitizeComment() was such that the working part of the buffer went over the end of the circular buffer and back to the beginning and, in that state, entitizeComment() was called then you could get a reference to an index past the end of the buffer and hence an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.

author: pquerna
msg: - Make lucene4c optional to build mod_mbox.
Lucene4c is not currently stable, so making it optional makes mod_mbox usable by other people...

author: felicity
msg: bug 4377: spamd POD referred to -a option which no longer exists
